```js
{
    name: "", // The only required field, you can leave everything else as is if you want

    remote: true,
    logo: "",
    links: {
        website: "",
        careers: "",
        x: "",
        facebook: "",
        linkedin: "",
        instagram: "",
        github: "",
        youtube: "",
        crunchbase: "",
        glassdoor: ""
    }
}
```
